author: Your Name (yourname)
name: Announce
description: A comprehensive announcement system for Discord servers. Send text or rich embed announcements, schedule messages, create recurring announcements, and manage templates.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Announce cog! Use `[p]announce` to get started.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores Discord IDs for channels, roles, and users as configured by server administrators. It also stores scheduled announcements and templates. No personal information is collected.
